The war grows desperate, you can do the unthinkable and arm the Slaves.
As [Root.GetFirstName]'s master, you can force [Root.GetFirstName] into bed.

[master.GetFirstName] calls you into [master.GetHerHis] bedchambers, "I have need of you tonight, remove your clothes." You reluctantly slip from your garb and approach the master's bed. Tears well in your eyes as [master.GetSheHe] begins to fondle you. "Now, onto the bed."

You command [slave.GetFirstName] into the bed, where you grip him roughly and begin to slowly stroke. He groans a few times before becoming tumescent. Your lips curl into a grin and you begin to touch yourself. Soon, the darkened halls begin echoing with your moans of pleasure.

You command [slave.GetFirstName] into the bed, you slowly massage yourself as you look upon her. You then slid your hand up her thigh, she begins to shiver. A grin forms on your face as you forcibly take hold over her. she releases a weak moan when you slip a finger inside. You douse the light as you slip into the bed.
As a matter of course you discover [runaway_slave.GetFirstName] in the nearby fields with supplies. You realize [runaway_slave.GetSheHe] is attemping to flee and give chase.
You catch up to[runaway_slave.GetFirstName] and take [runaway_slave.GetHerHim] to the ground, but despite your efforts [runaway_slave.GetSheHe] slips away. You've lost a slave.
You catch up to[runaway_slave.GetFirstName] and take [runaway_slave.GetHerHim] to the ground, you soon gain control and ensnare the runaway.
A great reckus comes from the slave hold, you race out and find two slaves, [slave_1.GetFirstName] [slave_2.GetFirstName], in a heated fight.
That's enough of that, end it here.
You begin to notice that two slaves, [slave_1.GetFirstName] [slave_2.GetFirstName], are more productive when working together, perhaps they are friends.
[slave_1.GetFirstName] has been injured in the course of [slave_1.GetHerHis] duties.
[slave_1.GetFirstName] has begun to show the wears of age, [slave_1.GetSheHe] is visibly less attractive.
You happen upon [slave_1.GetFirstName] in the study with a book. It appears that [slave_1.GetSheHe] has been learning to read and, apparently, increased [slave_1.GetHerHis] abilities.

A passing caravan has brought with it a number of slaves. One of the slaves, [slave_1.GetFirstName], has caught your eye as a quality sort and, after some negotiation, the caravan turns [slave_1.GetHerHim] over to you.
The Indenture of [From.GetFirstName] has come to an end.
A child has been born to one of your slaves, [slave_parent.GetFirstName].
I've enough slaves, be done with it.
Slavery has been ended in the Realm.
As Part of our Victory, we have rounded up a portion of the enemy population.
The slaves have bred and multiplied, the holds have been expanded to accommodate them.
Disease and death have diminished the slave population in great number, the holds have been shrunk for better management of the diminishing population.
